channel.title: [PI] making new currency
channel.description:
How can I make a shop take different currency. I have a different type of "coin" that I want for a certain shop. Iv looked on google and nothing, any help? So my questions are:
1. How can I make a different type of coin payment (except with a different Item Id).
2. How can I make it where the shop requires that certain type of item as payment.
